LanguageData.WNA_MakeAntigrainWarhead.label: make antigrain warhead
LanguageData.WNA_MakeAntigrainWarhead.description: Mix uranium and unstable particles and put the mixture into a plasteel shell to make an antigrain warhead.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeAttunementFabric.label: make attunement fabric
LanguageData.WNA_MakeAttunementFabric.description: make attunement fabric with raw material and a baseboard.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeBaseboard.label: make fabric baseboard
LanguageData.WNA_MakeBaseboard.description: make a baseboard used for making attunement fabric.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeConcrete.label: make reinforced concrete
LanguageData.WNA_MakeConcrete.description: make an advanced concrete sufficient for building.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeConcreteToo.label: make reinforced concrete
LanguageData.WNA_MakeConcreteToo.description: make an advanced concrete sufficient for building.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeDesolisium.label: make desolisium
LanguageData.WNA_MakeDesolisium.description: make an alloy sufficient for defending.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeDesolisiumToo.label: make desolisium
LanguageData.WNA_MakeDesolisiumToo.description: make an alloy sufficient for defending.
LanguageData.WNA_MakeTrinisium.label: make trinisium
LanguageData.WNA_MakeTrinisium.description: make an alloy sufficient for attacking.
